findings.title: Stored/DOM XSS Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential XSS vulnerability found in form field "searchFor"
findings.remediation: Implement proper input validation and output encoding. Sanitize all user input.

findings.title: Missing CSRF Protection
findings.description: Form may lack CSRF protection: search.php?test=query
findings.remediation: Implement CSRF tokens for all state-changing operations.
